docs.lead_paragraph: The virus may have been in West Africa for years, or decades, before last year’s outbreak.
docs.abstract: Growing body of evidence suggests that Ebola virus may have been lurking in West Africa for years, or even decades, before setting off epidemic there; scientists are trying to determine whether pre-epidemic infections may have occurred and to predict and prevent future outbreaks.
docs.snippet: The virus may have been in West Africa for years, or decades, before last year’s outbreak.

byline.original: By PAM BELLUCK and WILLIAM J. BROAD

docs.lead_paragraph: He was good on paper: Eloquent, mature, healthy and smart to boot.

headline.main: Sperm Bank Sued After Donor Details Emerge 7 Years Later
headline.print_headline: Sperm Bank Sued After Donor Details Emerge 7 Years Later

docs.snippet: He was good on paper: Eloquent, mature, healthy and smart to boot.

docs.lead_paragraph: Everyone's body is brimming with bacteria, and these microbes do plenty of good things like building the immune system and helping digestion. But modern diets, antibiotics and hygiene seem to be reducing the range of microbes occupying our anatomy.

headline.main: Amazonian Tribe Study Shows How Human Bodily Bacteria Is Changing
headline.print_headline: Amazonian Tribe Study Shows How Human Bodily Bacteria Is Changing

docs.snippet: Everyone's body is brimming with bacteria, and these microbes do plenty of good things like building the immune system and helping digestion. But modern diets, antibiotics and hygiene seem to be reducing the range of microbes occupying our anatomy.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a remote part of the Venezuelan Amazon, scientists have discovered that members of a village isolated from the modern world have the most diverse colonies of bacteria ever reported living in and on the human body.

headline.main: Unprecedented Germ Diversity Found in Remote Amazonian Tribe
headline.print_headline: Unprecedented Germ Diversity Found in Remote Amazonian Tribe

docs.snippet: In a remote part of the Venezuelan Amazon, scientists have discovered that members of a village isolated from the modern world have the most diverse colonies of bacteria ever reported living in and on the human body.

docs.lead_paragraph: Responding to suspected cases of male Ebola survivors infecting partners, scientists are investigating how long the virus can remain in semen.

headline.main: Ebola Researchers Take New Look at Risk of Sexual Transmission
headline.print_headline: Possible Ebola Infection via Sex Is Scrutinized

docs.abstract: International health officials respond to several incidents in which Ebola survivors are suspected of infecting their sexual partners with virus and launch investigation into whether Ebola can be spread through sex and how long virus can remain in semen.
docs.snippet: Responding to suspected cases of male Ebola survivors infecting partners, scientists are investigating how long the virus can remain in semen.

headline.main: The Right Dose of Exercise for a Longer Life
headline.print_headline: Exercise in Just the Right Dose

docs.abstract: Two new studies suggest that the ideal dose of exercise for a long life is a bit more than many of us currently believe we should get, but less than many of us might expect.
docs.snippet: Two new studies suggest that the ideal dose of exercise for a long life is a bit more than many of us currently believe we should get, but less than many of us might expect.
